name: Prospective Commercial Windows

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Target based on expert judgment regarding potential for improvement in the performance of the technology class relative to the current state-of-the-art

installed_cost_source.notes: Target cost set based on 5 year payback period objective; note that target cost is based on that estimated for the windows conduction portion of measure

product_lifetime_source.notes: Assumes midpoint of lifetime for aluminum and wood window assemblies, plus 5 years for improvements in quality; assumes commercial window lifetimes are comparable

source_data.title: Study of the Life Expectancy of Home Components

_description: Prospective dynamic and highly insulating windows with solar heat gain control and high R value for commercial buildings
